name: RecipeKeeper
0:
”Alexa, ask Recipe Keeper for cookie recipes”
”Alexa, ask Recipe Keeper to search for chocolate recipes”
”Alexa, ask Recipe Keeper to add tomatoes to my shopping list”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recipe keeper
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Recipe Keeper is the quick and easy way to collect, organize and share all your favorite recipes across your mobile, tablet, PC, Mac and Alexa devices.

You can search for your recipes, cooks hands-free and add items to your shopping list from your Alexa devices.

To get started, install the Recipe Keeper app from the iOS, Android, Windows or Mac app store and sign up for a Recipe Keeper account. Enable the Recipe Keeper skill for Amazon Alexa and link the skill to your Recipe Keeper account.

Recipes
To find a recipe, say "Alexa, ask Recipe Keeper for cookie recipes" and select a recipe from the results.
To hear the ingredients say "Ingredients".
To hear the directions say "Directions".
To find out the amount of an ingredient, say "Alexa, how many eggs?" or "Alexa, how much flour?".

Shopping Lists
To add an item to your shopping list say "Alexa, ask Recipe Keeper to add eggs to my shopping list".
To remove an item from your shopping list say "Alexa, ask Recipe Keeper to remove eggs from my shopping list".
To hear what's on your shopping list say "Alexa, ask Recipe Keeper what's on my shopping list".
